column5: Anyone have a fishing report that has been on Savant this year? Headed up next week and would like some tips. This will be my first trip to this lake so any pointers on where to head would be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance.
Get on Wildewoods site as they have a fishing report weekly. I have never been there but it is on my list. http://www.wildewoodflyin.com/fishing_report.html
We fish Lake Savant every year the end of July. Which camp are you staying at? Pooch in central Illinois
Pooch, We will be at Cliff and Roma's. How about you? Any pointers on where to start, it looks like a pretty big lake!
We will be at Wildewood for two weeks the end of July first of August. Send me your email with questions and we can talk. Pooch[email protected]
